metadata.title: Alexander Peev
metadata.description: React & TypeScript Developer with 5+ years of experience. Full-stack specialist in React, Next.js, and modern web technologies. Teaching contributor and open-source developer based in Sofia, Bulgaria.

hero.headline: Developer with
hero.subheadline: Working a 9-5 as a Web Developer while also supporting and developing company and client websites.
hero.imageAlt: Image of Alexander Peev with a confident smile

roles.title: React Developer
roles.description: Building React applications with TypeScript and React Query, integrating AI-powered features for image generation and chat experiences.
highlights: Leading feature development across multiple React apps.
Integrating AI services for automation and personalization.
Driving UI consistency with shared component libraries.

roles.title: Fullstack Developer
roles.description: As a web developer, I developed both back-end and front-end features, and the main technologies I used were JavaScript and React.
highlights: Worked on two e-commerce projects: SFRA application, and a React PWA Kit application.
Worked as a part of a multinational team while following the Scrum methodology.

roles.title: Contract Developer
roles.description: As a fullstack contract developer, I work on diverse projects for different companies
highlights: Currently developing a showcase website using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
Develop and support an e-commerce site using WordPress, jQuery, and PHP.
Create and support an e-commerce site using Shopify, Liquid, and JavaScript.

roles.title: University Assistant
roles.company: St. Cyril and St. Methodius University of Veliko Tarnovo
highlights: Led courses in "Web Development with ASP.NET Core", "Desktop Applications with .NET", and "Programming Basics with C#"
Recorded YouTube tutorials in which people could follow me step by step as I built projects.

items.title: Master's degree
items.subtitle: St. Cyril and St. Methodius University of Veliko Tarnovo

items.title: Bachelor's degree
items.subtitle: St. Cyril and St. Methodius University of Veliko Tarnovo

projects.title: Client Projects
projects.description: Besides my full-time role, I work with different companies as a freelance developer, delivering custom sites for their specific needs and budgets. Here are some of the projects:

nda.title: Additional Projects
nda.description: Over the past year, I've worked on several new projects for various companies. Due to non-disclosure agreements, I'm unable to share these publicly. If you're interested in learning more about my recent work, I'd be happy to discuss these projects during a conversation.

items.name: Company Showcase Site
items.description: Developed a modern showcase website for Bronze Initial Letters, featuring an elegant design that highlights historical manuscripts and bronze sculptures.
items.description2: Built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS for optimal performance and responsive navigation.

items.name: Business Online Store
items.description: Created a fully functional e-commerce platform, specializing in climbing volumes and training equipment. Features product catalogs, shopping cart functionality, and secure checkout.
items.description2: Developed using WordPress, custom PHP code, and jQuery with optimized performance.

items.name: Brand Online Store
items.description: Built a custom storefront for Sobriety Pins, featuring a modern design that aligns with the brand's mission.
items.description2: Built with Shopify, including custom theme development using Liquid templates, and enhanced functionality through JavaScript.

openSourceProjects.title: Open-Source Projects
openSourceProjects.description: I build open-source projects on GitHub to learn new tools and share my work. Here are some of the projects:

items.name: MERN Role-Based Platform
items.description: MERN article platform with role-based auth. Users write, explore, and vote on articles. React/TypeScript and Express/MongoDB.

items.name: Next.js Catalog App
items.description: Next.js web app with PostgreSQL API and Tailwind CSS. Features dynamic routes displaying weapon categories and individual weapons.

items.name: Angular Landmarks App
items.description: Angular web app with Firebase and Bootstrap. Offers interactive maps with login access and full tools for handling location data.

items.name: Vue.js Map App
items.description: Vue.js web app with Firebase. Features interactive maps with authentication and CRUD operations for managing locations.

accessibility.primaryCta: Schedule a call with Alexander Peev
